amendment.description: To strike a provision relating to a special resource study.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2215 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Young. (consideration: CR S1892; text: CR S1892) To strike a provision relating to a special resource study.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2215 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Young.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
